Java.title: Module 1: Introduction to Java
Java.details: Learn Java syntax, data types, and simple applications.

Java.title: Control Flow and Loops
Java.details: Understand loops and conditional statements in Java.

Java.title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
Java.details: Explore encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, and abstraction.

Java.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
Java.details: Understand linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and sorting/searching algorithms using Java.

Java.title: Java Collections Framework
Java.details: Explore ArrayList, HashMap, HashSet, and other built-in Java collection classes.

Java.title: Multithreading and Concurrency
Java.details: Learn how to implement multi-threading, synchronization, and concurrent programming.

Java.title: File Handling and I/O Streams
Java.details: Understand file handling, serialization, and input/output stream operations in Java.

Java.title: Database Connectivity with JDBC
Java.details: Connect Java applications to databases using JDBC and perform CRUD operations.

Java.title: Java for Web Development
Java.details: Learn how to build dynamic web applications using JSP, Servlets, and Java frameworks.

Java.title: Spring Boot and RESTful APIs
Java.details: Develop microservices using Spring Boot and build RESTful APIs.

Java.title: Microservices Architecture
Java.details: Understand the fundamentals of microservices, API gateway, and cloud deployments.

Java.title: Project Work
Java.details: Apply your Java knowledge in real-world projects, including web applications and API development.

Python.title: Introduction to Python
Python.details: Learn Python basics, syntax, and simple applications.

Python.title: Control Flow and Functions
Python.details: Understand loops, conditionals, and function writing in Python.

Python.title: OOP in Python
Python.details: Learn classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism in Python.
